question: 楽しむ
sourceMnemonic: You've hopefully seen the word <ja>楽しい</ja>, which means "fun." Now you're going to figure out the verb version (ends in an <ja>う</ja> sound, right?) of it. That would be <vocabulary>to enjoy</vocabulary>. Speaking of which, I hope you're enjoying WaniKani so far!
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the same as the word <ja>楽しい</ja>, so be sure to know that word and you'll be able to apply it over here.
